title: Food and Drinks 1
sentences: I like eating fresh fruit for breakfast.
Do you (formal) prefer drinking coffee or tea?
Will you (informal) please buy a carton of milk?
I would like to order a glass of orange juice.
Would you (formal) like sugar in your coffee?
Ich esse mein Brot am liebsten mit
I like eating my bread best with cheese.
Have you (informal) seen the salt on the table?
We still need eggs for the cake.
I am cooking a hot soup today.
The potatoes have to cook for another ten minutes.
Do you (informal) prefer eating rice or pasta?
I would like an apple juice.
Would you (formal) like a glass of red wine?
I don't like butter on my bread.
I am drinking a cool beer.
We are eating rice with vegetables today.
Are you (formal) also taking/using oil for the salad?
dictionary:
das Obst - fruit
der Tee - tea
das Gemüse - vegetables
die Milch - milk
der Orangensaft - orange juice
der Zucker - sugar
das Fleisch - meat
der Käse - cheese
das Salz - salt
die Eier - eggs
der Fisch - fish
die Suppe - soup
die Kartoffeln - potatoes
die Nudeln - pasta
das Hähnchen - chicken
der Apfelsaft - apple juice
der Rotwein - red wine
die Butter - butter
der Schinken - ham
der Pfeffer - pepper
das Bier - beer
der Reis - rice
die Wurst - sausage
die Äpfel - apples
das Öl - oil
